sections.section_title: Short title, extent and commencement
sections.body: (1) This Act may be called the Stamp Act, 1899. (2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan. (3) It shall come into force on the first day of July 1899.

sections.section_title: Definitions
sections.body: In this Act, unless there is something repugnant in the subject or context, "Banker" includes a bank and any person acting as a banker.
